allow: Bash(xargs -I {} sh -c 'echo ""=== {} ==="" && python3 -c ""import json; data=json.load\(open\(\\""{}\\"", \\""r\\""\)\); cells=[c for c in data.get\(\\""cells\\"", []\) if c.get\(\\""cell_type\\""\) == \\""code\\""]; print\(\\""\\\\n\\"".join\([c.get\(\\""source\\"", \\""\\""\) for c in cells[:10]]\)\)"" 2>/dev/null | head -100')
